author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Randgold Resources Says Ministry Of Mines Has Not Yet Formally Responded To Industry's Proposal
text: April 23, 2018 / 8:05 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Randgold Resources Says Ministry Of Mines Has Not Yet Formally Responded To Industry's Proposal Reuters Staff April 23 (Reuters) - Randgold Resources: * RANDGOLD RESOURCES LTD - MINISTRY OF MINES HAS NOT YET FORMALLY RESPONDED TO INDUSTRY‘S PROPOSAL * RANDGOLD RESOURCES LTD - ENGAGEMENT THROUGH WORKING GROUPS SET UP TO DRAFT REGULATIONS TO IMPLEMENT LAW HAS BEEN “CONSTRUCTIVE” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
